context: We have bulk RNA sequencing data derived from lung cancer samples. Each feature is a gene (or possibly a few genes, separated by "|"). The dataset includes 1017 samples and 1000 features. We wish to build a statistical model that classifies samples into the categories "lung adenocarcinoma (LUAD) and lung squamous cell carcinoma (LUSC)".
task: classifying lung adenocarcinoma (LUAD) vs. lung squamous cell carcinoma (LUSC)
